entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl and is described as looking coldly up at the other owl.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one writing a letter to Ron and has permission from Muggles to come.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the recipient of Harry's letter and will see him tomorrow at five o'clock.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are a group of people who have given Harry permission to come.

relationships.description: Harry is writing a letter to Ron.
Harry has permission from Muggles to come.
